aircraft.value: Nighthawk Stealth - AC-4510-165 at Sector West Station

defect_observed.value: Starter generator malfunction. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 25/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 28/10/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 26/10/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 01/11/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 01/11/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
